mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.cheliang_name as cheliangName ,a.cheliang_types as cheliangTypes ,a.cheliang_paihao as cheliangPaihao ,a.cheliang_content as cheliangContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.zhunjia_types as zhunjiaTypes ,yonghu.jiashizhenghao as jiashizhenghao ,yonghu.yonghu_content as yonghuContent
FROM cheliang a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.cheliang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangName},'%')
and a.cheliang_types = #{params.cheliangTypes}
and a.cheliang_paihao like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangPaihao},'%')
and a.cheliang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.zhunjia_types = #{params.zhunjiaTypes}
and yonghu.jiashizhenghao like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiashizhenghao},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
